date: Tue Feb 08 2022 03:17:04 GMT+1100 (Australian Eastern Daylight Time)
description: The Philadelphia 76ers and the Brooklyn Nets have been at the forefront of every trade rumor recently as they move into trade deadline week in the NBA.
metaDescription: AI generated artwork about the trade rumor that the 76ers and the Nets talk about trading  James Harden for Ben Simmons as they move into trade deadline week in the NBA.
